            },\r
        },\r

        },\r

                false: null,\r
            },\r
        },\r
    }),\r
    parentItem: cva([\r
        "UI-VerticalMenu__parentItem",\r
        "group/verticalMenu_parentItem",\r
        "cursor-pointer w-full",\r
    ]),\r
    itemChevron: cva([\r
        "UI-VerticalMenu__itemChevron",\r
        "size-4 transition-transform group-data-[state=open]/verticalMenu_parentItem:rotate-90",\r
    ]),\r
    icon: cva([\r
        "UI-VerticalMenu__icon",\r
        "flex-shrink-0 mr-3",\r
        "text-[--muted]",\r
        "group-hover/verticalMenu_item:text-[--foreground]", // Item Hover\r
        "group-data-[current=true]/verticalMenu_item:text-[--foreground]", // Item Current\r
    ], {\r
        variants: {\r
            size: {\r
                sm: "size-4",\r
                md: "size-5",\r
                lg: "size-6",\r
            },\r
            center: {\r
                true: "mr-0",\r
                false: null,\r
            },\r
        },\r
        defaultVariants: {\r
            size: "md",\r
        },\r
    }),\r
    subContent: cva([\r
        "UI-VerticalMenu__subContent",\r
        "border-b py-1",\r
    ]),\r
